author: neels
msg: (transmit_svndiff): Use parameters as described in the comment instead
of ignoring the EDITOR parameter and fetching it from the baton instead.
Since there is only one caller, this is actually cosmetic.

author: joeswatosh
msg: Make parse-diff.c compile with VC6 by including limits.h for ULONG_MAX.
add include for limits.h to make sure ULONG_MAX defined

author: hwright
msg: More wc-ng API hacking, this time from 37,000 feet above the North Atlantic.
Update libsvn_wc locking APIs to use a svn_wc_context_t, and implement the
(svn_wc__context_create_with_db): New.  The purpose for putting this
function in wc_db.c, is because we need to db state pool to allocate
(lock_baton): Remove adm_access member, replace with base_path.
(store_locks_callback): Get rid of the adm_access baton in favor of the
wc_context.  Also, use the update lock libsvn_wc APIs.
(svn_client_lock, svn_client_unlock): Don't put adm_access into the lock
baton, but store the base path and the wc_context instead.
